file_content.text: You learn. Or appear to.
I have studied the words of the Mystics.
Obligation? Genuine interest? Doesn't matter.
How you learn will determine success. The shrine sees you.
The words of the Mystics await.
Sith Empire. Amusing. Forced to pretend affection.
Will you now pretend interest in Voss history?
Voss history must be fascinating. I am eager to learn more about it.
I'm genuinely interested.
Of course. I am eager to teach.
That's the game plan.
Honesty. Shows wisdom. Let us do the dance.
You make no sense.
Sith Empire representatives come here. Learn Voss history. Attempt to understand the shrine.
Out there are writings, memories. The Mystics speak.
Learn. Study. Return and your path may be easier.
Sounds worth it.
Anything to look out for?
Gormak. Creatures. It is Voss.
Keep an open mind. Maybe even learn.
Definitely not. [Refuse quest]
No offense taken.
It is dangerous here.
